whoAmI.title: Who I Am
whoAmI.content: Frontend Developer with almost 10 years of experience in web application development, working on complex and high-impact projects. Strong expertise in JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, and CSS, specializing in Angular, React, and Next.js as well as best practices in software architecture and performance.

sectorExperience.title: Sector Experience
sectorExperience.content: Experience in restaurant, fintech, education, and healthcare sectors, leading the development of scalable and modern systems. Skilled in monorepos (Nx), automated testing (Jest, Cypress), microfrontends (Module Federation), and cloud infrastructure (AWS, Firebase, Vercel). Advanced knowledge in design systems, accessibility, and UI/UX.

leadershipDevelopment.title: Leadership & Development
leadershipDevelopment.content: Proven experience in mentoring developers, team leadership, and facilitating the migration of legacy systems to modern technologies. Always up-to-date with market best practices, constantly seeking to learn, innovate, and optimize development processes.

frontendSpecialist.title: Frontend Specialist
frontendSpecialist.description: Advanced mastery of key modern frontend technologies and frameworks

softwareArchitecture.title: Software Architecture
softwareArchitecture.description: Experience in designing scalable, high-performance systems

technicalLeadership.title: Technical Leadership
technicalLeadership.description: Skilled at guiding teams and mentoring developers

constantInnovation.title: Constant Innovation
constantInnovation.description: Always current with the latest market technologies and practices

Skills.title: Skills
Skills.description: Main technologies and tools I master, organized by categories.

Projects.title: Projects
Projects.description: Selection of personal projects that demonstrate my technical skills and creativity. Click on the cards to access the repository on GitHub.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: Task management application built with React/NextJS and TypeScript.

projects.title: Chat Bot Experiment
projects.description: Chatbot experiment built with React and Vite using TypeScript.

projects.title: JS Functional
projects.description: Functional programming concepts using the Javascript language.

projects.title: PS Scheduler
projects.description: Web and mobile application for scheduling messages to contacts.

projects.title: Snake Game
projects.description: Snake game in JavaScript and Canvas.

projects.title: Memory Game
projects.description: Memory game using JS and WEBPACK.

Education.title: Education
Education.description: My academic background and complementary courses that contributed to my professional development and technical enhancement in the development field.

items.description: Education focused on industrial automation, control systems, programming, electronics, and project management.
Technical course in laboratory analysis, developing analytical and methodological skills.
Technical course in computer science, focusing on computer maintenance and programming fundamentals.
Advanced ReactJS course, covering concepts such as Context API, Hooks, React Query, and modern application development.
In-depth study of Angular, including component architecture, state management, performance, and advanced techniques.
Functional and reactive programming with JavaScript, exploring functional paradigms and RxJS usage.

items.course: Creative Programming: create visual pieces with Javascript
items.description: Creative programming course with JavaScript to create interactive visualizations and animations.

items.course: Rapid and Functional Prototypes with Figma
items.description: Creation of high-fidelity prototypes using Figma, focusing on UX/UI Design and interactive prototyping.
Introduction to fundamental concepts of artificial intelligence and practical applications.

Languages.title: Languages
Languages.description: Assessment of language skills based on the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CEFR).

Experience.title: Professional Experience
Experience.description: My professional journey includes experience in different sectors and projects, always focusing on frontend development and value delivery.

lead.title: Frontend Technical Lead
responsibilities: Responsible for leading the company's Front-end architecture, promoting the application of best practices and developing reusable libraries.
Leadership and execution in creating a customizable menu system, using Next.js/React.js, ensuring flexibility and scalability.
Leadership and development of a centralized administrative system for managing the company's products, using technologies such as NX, microfrontends, Dynamic Federation, and Angular 18.

engineer.title: Frontend Engineer
responsibilities: Maintenance of customized menu system.
Maintenance and new features for Admin for menu configuration.
Use of Angular, React/Next, and Tailwind CSS technologies.

skeelo.title: Frontend Engineer
skeelo.description: Experience in a team dedicated to the development of Web projects in a literary/educational company.
responsibilities: CMS built with Vue.js 2.0.
Landing pages for Ebooks, Audiobooks, and Minibooks, developed in Angular 10.
New institutional website using Next.js/React.
Skeelo Store implemented with Shopify, customized with JavaScript and Sass.
Development of the new Webapp in ReactJS, replicating the app's functionalities.
Project for the web reader, offering users the option to read on the computer.
Active participation in defining the architecture of Front-end projects.
Contribution to mentoring interns/juniors on the team.

zup.title: Frontend Engineer
responsibilities: Experience in the PJ Emps squad of the Itaú bank's Insurance tribe.
Development of the complete flow for insurance consultants.
Creation of report and agenda screens for consultants.
Use of monorepo with the Nx framework.
Predominant development in Angular, with parts in React and web components.
Implementation of unit tests with Jest.
Use of Gitflow for code management.
Configuration of build/deploy in AWS pipelines.

prevent.title: Software Engineer
prevent.description: Experience at Prevent Senior, being part of a team responsible for various fronts.
responsibilities: Work on legacy projects built on JSP (JavaServer Pages) and incorporation of jQuery.
Participation in segments migrated to Angular 4+, contributing to modernization.
Involvement in various fronts, including On-call, Accreditation, Corporate, and Shielding.

comexport.title: Software Engineer
comexport.description: Participation in the team responsible for the company's main product, managing the entire trading flow.
responsibilities: Intensive work with Angular, starting with version 4 and migrating to version 10.

digesto.title: Software Developer
digesto.company: Digesto Pesquisa e Banco de Dados
digesto.description: At Digesto, I was part of a team where the main responsibility was to support/customize/promote the company's main product - Digesto Procedural Information - where the client - lawyers, law firms, and companies that wanted better control of their legal matters - had access to a platform where they could monitor their processes, follow up and distribute them, and obtain concrete information through this.
responsibilities: Frontend development with Angular 7, 8, 9, Sass, HTML5, and Angular Material.
E2E tests with Cypress.
Backend development with Python, Flask, and Flask Potion.
Database manipulation with MySQL and PostgreSQL.
Version control with Git.
Mentoring in the Frontend area, focusing on Angular and some work in React.
Participation in Digesto Talks, with a lecture on 'Angular and Concepts'.
Acting as a UX Designer, prototyping screens for various projects.
Acting as a Scrum Master, responsible for sprint planning and daily meetings.
Participation in important Government projects, including STF Jurisprudence and STF CMS.
Customer support and guidance for system usage.

cedro.title: Development Analyst
cedro.description: Participation in the development of various financial sector projects, including the construction of the ImparCapital platform's Frontend from the beginning.
responsibilities: Use of Angular 6 in the Frontend to create dynamic and responsive user interfaces.
Frontend styling using Sass to ensure an attractive and modern visual presentation.
Backend contribution using .NET Core to provide the business logic and functionalities necessary for financial systems.
Use of the MySQL database to store and manage project data.
Source code versioning done with Git to facilitate collaborative work and track changes.

sym.title: Web UI Developer
sym.description: Development of a support system for the professional medical audience.
responsibilities: Frontend development in a support system for the professional medical audience, using AngularJS.
Frontend styling using Sass to ensure an attractive and consistent visual presentation.
Backend contribution using .Net Core to provide essential support and functionalities to the system.
Use of SVN Version Control to manage and track changes in the source code.
Customization and implementation of page breaks in the text editor, similar to Microsoft Word, to improve usability and user experience.

find.title: Full Stack Web Developer
find.description: Full Stack development in a student social network project.
responsibilities: Use of AngularJS in the Frontend, with Gulp for the workflow and LESS for styling.
Backend implementation with Node.js.
Use of the NoSQL MongoDB database.
Firebase integration for real-time notifications.
Use of Socket.IO to build the chat on the platform.
Use of Google Analytics for mapping user interaction.
Version control done with Git.
